text: Bangladesh Standard Time (BST) is the time zone for Bangladesh. It is six hours ahead of UTC (UTC+6). Bangladesh does not observe any daylight saving time. Bangladesh used summer time, making it Bangladesh Daylight Time (BDT). This was used from June 19 until December 31, 2009. The measure has not been used since. ==References== ==Other websites== * The current time in Bangladesh * Current local time in Dhaka Category:Bangladesh Bangladesh
title: Bangladesh Standard Time
